summary:
Adds a new playable race
(only Female)
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Description[/size]
[size=2]Adds a new playable race (female only)
Race Traits are the same as Argonian race's. 
[/size]
[size=4]Installation
[/size]Extract the .zip file.
[size=2]Drop all the files into \Skyrim\Data folder.
Install the DW2.esp plugin using a mod manager.[/size]

[size=4]Requirements
[/size]None.

[size=4]Notes [/size]
This race uses the helmet models from the Argonian race.But due to the head being slightly smaller helmets may look a bit too big for the head.
Only female (males look same as the Argonians.)
This race uses the  Argonian textures, so any mod that changes the argonian textures will effect this race.
[size=2]Also uses the Khajiit eye textures.[/size]
author: mota91
